name: 2023 International Conference on Computer Graphics and Image Processing
content: Paper Publication: CGIP 2023 CPS Conference Proceedings, archived in IEEE Xplore, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Good papers may be published in Algorithms (ISSN: 1999-4893, CiteScore: 3.3, Q2), indexed by Scopus, ESCI (Web of Science), Ei Compendex free of charge.
